text: Who will finance Ukraine's defence? 🤔 Nato's proposal of a 5-year, 100bn euro package of military aid to Ukraine could be a game-changer. 💪🏼🇺🇦 But let's not forget, the US has also pledged support through the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative. 💰🇺🇸 It's time for the international community to come together and ensure Ukraine has the resources it needs to defend itself. 🌎💪🏼
